text: I order from here all the time. Was especially happy today- that on the busiest time of night on the busiest night of the week, Friday, my food came within 24 minutes. text: I like to save 5 stars for when I'm blown away, but they put a topping on half the pizza that didn't belong so i have to knock it from 4 to 3. Food got here in 25 minutes when they said 35-45. It's papa johns,  we've all tried it before i feel.
